name: After Death (itch) (Windik)
description:
Hi to everyone!

It's my first game, and it's need a lot of feauters, but please let me know, if you like it a little.

Hero of the game died and strange power put him to another world. Help him know where He is and how he could return to the Home World!

For now it's work only at Windows, but very soon i will place builds for Linux and Mac!

Player controls:

W,A,S,D - movement

Spacebar - Jump

Shift - Shooting

Esc - Exit game
